items.editorNote: Morgan Stanley filed with the SEC for Bitcoin and Solana ETFs, marking its first crypto ETF efforts under its main brand and introducing staking rewards in Solana trust.
keyPoints: The two ETFs are passive funds tracking Bitcoin and Solana prices without leverage or active trading strategies.
Morgan Stanley Investment Management Inc. is the sponsor for the Bitcoin Trust, using major spot exchanges for daily share valuation.
The Solana Trust uniquely includes staking rewards as part of its return, differentiating it from typical crypto ETFs.
Neither ETF has a confirmed listing exchange or ticker symbol yet, indicating early-stage regulatory and market positioning.

readOriginal.reason: The original contains detailed prospectus excerpts on operational mechanics, including creation/redemption processes and potential prime broker use, plus verbatim CIO commentary.
readOriginal.whoShouldRead: Investment professionals and compliance officers evaluating crypto ETF structures and regulatory filings.

items.originalTitle: Morgan Stanley just filed for two crypto ETFs, but one massive omission sends a brutal signal
